attributes.action: force councils to either repair road surfaces or pay for cars to be serviced free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up, like most tax payers, of the pot holes and general state of repair of this country's road. The damage caused by the constant hitting of pot holes and running on uneven surfaces is considerable.

I petition that all councils should, until they have fixed all road surfaces, be forced that cars should be serviced at that councils expense on an annual basis and any road impact costs covered by the council. e.g. suspension & tyre repair
